level.heading: Expiration.
level.text: If any series of bonds is not issued, sold, and delivered to the original purchaser within 3 years of the date of Council approval of a project pursuant to § 47-340.03, the authorization provided in this subchapter with respect to the issuance, sale, and delivery of such series of bonds shall expire.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-340.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-46
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-46, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-340.01.
